snippet: Prime Minister Habib Essid presented his second government in two weeks on Monday, this time including more parties and a position for Islamists.
abstract: Tunisian Prime Min Habib Essid presents proposed cabinet for second time in two weeks, after first cabinet failed no-confidence vote.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Habib Essid presented his second government in two weeks on Monday, this time including more parties and a position for Islamists.

headline.main: Tunisia: Premier Announces More Inclusive Cabinet
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Premier Announces More Inclusive Cabinet
